::: {#fa7ad965 .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import requests
import os
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import pandas as pd
import time
```
:::


::: {#0ccde131 .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
os.system('pip show beautifulsoup4')
```
:::


Web scraping on www.whiskynotes.be

# year page

::: {#c3313cc4 .cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
year_ur='https://www.whiskynotes.be/2023'
```
:::


![](images/clipboard-677064128.png)

# read in html

::: {#49504c51 .cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
# Send an HTTP GET request to the website
headers = {'User-Agent': 'My User Agent'}
response = requests.get(year_ur,headers=headers)
```
:::


::: {#6ac83389 .cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
# success code - 200 
print(response) 
```
:::


::: {#07f07640 .cell execution_count=6}
``` {.python .cell-code}
#print(response.content)
```
:::


::: {#578631b5 .cell execution_count=7}
``` {.python .cell-code}
# Parse the HTML code using BeautifulSoup
soup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, 'html.parser')
```
:::


# review bottle name on one year

::: {#e9388f01 .cell execution_count=8}
``` {.python .cell-code}
bottle001=soup.find_all('p')
```
:::


::: {#606fc111 .cell execution_count=9}
``` {.python .cell-code}
for i in bottle001[1:5]:
  i.get_text()
```
:::


# review topic name on one year

::: {#e1fd1df5 .cell execution_count=10}
``` {.python .cell-code}
topic001=soup.select('.archive-link')
```
:::


::: {#3bc97a9d .cell execution_count=11}
``` {.python .cell-code}
for i in topic001[1:5]:
  i.get_text()
```
:::


::: {#4032169b .cell execution_count=12}
``` {.python .cell-code}
topic_link=soup.select('.entry-permalink')

for link in topic_link[1:5]:
  link.get('href')

```
:::
